overview:
Christian Thaler-Wolski joined the Wellington team in late 2009. He works with the Digital Media and Software investment team on identifying exciting investment opportunities and building relationships with the great entrepreneurs behind these companies.

Christian brings entrepreneurial and industry experience to his role. He started his career at ORACLE, the global leader in the software industry. In 2007 he joined the management team of student loan vendor Career Concept AG as the Director of Business Development. Before strengthening the Wellington team, he already gained rich insights and experience in the European VC business by working for an established German player in this field.
